head.title: How Does It Do on Strained Peas?

hedline.hl1: How Does It Do on Strained Peas?

abstract.p: Vaska Herbal Fresh Laundry Powder, mixture of pure soap and lavender, is ideal for children's wash; photo (S)

block.p: Vaska Herbal Fresh Laundry Powder, in a humble recycled brown-paper carton, is a mixture of pure soap (not detergent) and lavender. So it's perfect for the baby being raised All Natural. It is hypoallergenic and mild enough for children's wash, and even though it smells wonderful in the box, Vaska laundry powder does not leave any scent behind in clothes. It is available only at Vaska, which calls itself a ''gourmet laundry store,'' at 2403 San Pablo Avenue in Berkeley, Calif. (510-548-2092), or through the Internet at www.vaskahome .com. A five-pound box, which will wash 88 loads, costs $18.
